result.execSummary:
The defendant Emily J Thurmann was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $25.00 per month.  2 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Bail/Bond Hearing on June 30, 2015
ZCI

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   Do not possess any drug paraphernalia.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.  This case has been assigned to Judge Marik, Branch 6.

Defendant Emily J Thurmann in court with attorney Sheila M. Smith.  Defendant Emily J Thurmann in custody.  Brian Van Schyndel for Erika Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Katie Giebel.   Transcript filed: 7-29-15 ds.  Req bond mod.  
BTC:  Mod bond to 500S; No drg.  No PDP.  ZCI.  Reside @ parents house.
Sheila Smith
